column3: UPDATE:  Work Scheduled for I-75N at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
column4: Bridge deck overlay project scheduled from Thursday 9/9 at 9:00 p.m. thru Thursday 10/7.

column3: UPDATE:  Work Scheduled for I-75N at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
column4: Two lanes will remain open between Exit 97 and the end of the bridge.

column3: UPDATE:  Work Scheduled for I-75N at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
column4: Speed limit will be 55 mph.  Use added caution if traveling in this area.
